column1: #Text=Wu says : " So then the crowds are gathered , all excited to see my coronation , when all of a sudden , these boulders come rolling through .
#Text=" Wu says : " Now , now , now , do n't get yourself in a tizzy .
#Text=No , sir , Mako , when we get to Ba Sing Se , it 'll just be two kooky pals , living the life !
